title: Indian Coconut, Almond and Poppy Seed Pudding - Gasagage Payasa
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons poppy seeds', '3 tablespoons almonds', '1 tablespoon uncooked white rice', '35g fresh grated coconut', '475ml water', '220g jaggery (palm sugar)', '1 pinch saffron threads', '1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom']
